items.headline: Opendoor is an ‘AI company,’ new CEO says. The stock is still falling after earnings.
items.summary_en: Opendoor Technologies, the online real-estate platform whose stock has recently attracted a surge of meme-like attention, will ride the artificial-intelligence wave to profitability, according to its new chief executive.

items.headline: Block’s results top expectations, but a few nitpicks weigh on the stock
items.summary_en: Gross profit growth at Square lagged growth in payment volume, and the company’s earnings beat was materially smaller than its gross-profit beat, noted an analyst.

items.headline: DoorDash stock just had its steepest drop ever, amid spending worries. Some analysts are OK with that.
items.summary_en: The anxiety arrived after DoorDash on Wednesday said it would spend several hundred million dollars more on “new initiatives and platform development” in 2026 than it did last year.

items.headline: Big Tech drags down S&P 500 amid jitters over highly valued stock market
items.summary_en: U.S. stocks are stumbling this month amid worries over stretched valuations, with the S&P 500’s concentration in Big Tech making it vulnerable to pullbacks like the one seen Thursday.
